message.content:
{"id": "15899", 
"title": "Bug 15899: 'Close all saved' does not work all the time", 
"description": "When using build 20020508 with the latest UI code, selecting 'Close All Saved' from the file menu does not have any effect when all editors are open. The expected behavior is to close all open editors, including any unsaved changes.", 
"OB": "- Using build 20020508 with the latest UI code
- Create a new file called f1.txt
- Open multiple editors
- Select 'Close All Saved' from the file menu
- Observe that nothing happens
- Expected: All open editors should be closed, including any unsaved changes", 
"EB": "", 
"SR": "- Investigate the issue with 'Close All Saved' function
- Identify the cause for the inconsistent behavior
- Fix the issue so that 'Close All Saved' properly closes all open editors"}
